articles.title: Improved subscription forms
articles.desc: The display of fields labels on header and footer subscription forms has been improved. When displayed outside their field, they are now more widely spaced.

articles.title: Better temporary images storage
articles.desc: The temporary images are now stored in the upload(wordpress)/media(joomla) directory as they should be.

articles.title: EventBooking integration
articles.desc: We added a security to make sure the EventBooking time isn't doubled in the date format.

articles.title: EasyBlog images
articles.desc: The EasyBlog images stored on users are now correctly displayed in the email editor.

articles.title: Front-end lists
articles.desc: The lists could no longer be saved when edited from the front-end menu.

articles.title: RSEventsPro category filter
articles.desc: A category filter of RSEventsPro integration in the editor is now correctly applied.

articles.title: Better integration plugins
articles.desc: All the integration plugins have been updated to better follow WordPress guidelines.

articles.title: Multisite better compatibility
articles.desc: The database tables and default values are now correctly installed when a new sub-site is created on a WordPress multisite network.

articles.title: Fixed EventOn integration
articles.desc: The installation of the EventOn integration is fixed and does not crash anymore.

splash_content.title: THE FIXES INCLUDED IN THIS VERSION

articles.title: Subscription form confirmation message
articles.desc: The confirmation message when submitting a subscription form could be displayed twice, this has been fixed.

articles.title: Truncated content insertion
articles.desc: The lists and tables in inserted content are not removed anymore when the content is truncated after X characters.

articles.title: Deleted lists on forms
articles.desc: We have corrected the error that was displayed in a form when a list that has been deleted was still selected in the form settings.

articles.title: File custom field in notifications
articles.desc: The custom field type File is now correctly displayed in the notification emails.
